p: Studies indicate that there were regime shifts in the 1980s in environmental and ecological indicators driven by rapid global warming 21 causing a global shift of the climatic system to a warmer state in a time span of only a few years. Clear warming trend of the troposphere temperatures but cooler stratosphere temperatures above Switzerland since the 1980s have been noted 22. This 21 22 appears to suggest that a climatic tipping point was reached in the 1980s, with the climatic system now being in a different (stable) state.
